title: Resolution not supported
body: my last monitor just burned itself out and i got a 2nd hand "Dell E178fp" monitor to replace it.. now everything is working just fine.. all games and such but league client won't let me play on full screen mode. i've tried almost all resolutions including the one recommended by the monitor i.e 1280x1024 but its just not working with "can't display this video mode" error.. any suggestions to why this problem is only appearing in the league's case?

replies.body: Your monitor may not be setup to play the game properly on full screen.  You might be able to fix this by tapping Alt+Enter in-game, which would swap to Windowed mode and restore the game screen.  Try our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to make sure your drivers are up to date, otherwise hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in case our tech team can find options for you.

Well, that's a pretty old square type of monitor. Have you tried to play it in borderless mode? It's a windowed mode without the borders, so it looks the same as full screen, and it should automatically set the resolution.
